languages.text: "Это и называется быть Вольным Торговцем. Просто тебе фантазии не хватает, чтобы это понять".
"This is what being a Rogue Trader is all about. You simply lack the imagination to grasp it."
languages.original_text: "Это и называется быть Вольным Торговцем. Просто тебе фантазии не хватает, чтобы это понять".

traits.locale_text: "This is what being a Rogue Trader is all about. You simply lack the imagination to understand it."
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

traits.locale_text: "This is what being a Rogue Trader is all about. You simply lack the imagination to grasp it."

traits.locale_text: "This is what being a Rogue Trader is all about. You simply lack the imagination to grasp it."
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: « C'est pourtant ce que doit être un libre-marchand. Vous manquez simplement d'imagination pour le comprendre. »
languages.original_text: "This is what being a Rogue Trader is all about. You simply lack the imagination to grasp it."

traits.locale_text: « C'est pourtant ce que doit être un libre-marchand. Vous manquez simplement d'imagination pour le comprendre. »
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: «En eso consiste ser Comerciante Independiente. Pero te falta la imaginación necesaria para comprenderlo».
languages.original_text: "This is what being a Rogue Trader is all about. You simply lack the imagination to grasp it."

traits.locale_text: «En eso consiste ser Comerciante Independiente. Pero te falta la imaginación necesaria para comprenderlo».
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: “身为行商浪人就应该是这个样子。你只是缺乏想象力，无法把握这样的机会罢了。”
languages.original_text: "This is what being a Rogue Trader is all about. You simply lack the imagination to grasp it."

traits.locale_text: “身为行商浪人就应该是这个样子。你只是缺乏想象力，无法把握这样的机会罢了。”
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: 「自由開拓者とは、まさにこういうものなのだ。お前には、それを理解するだけの想像力が欠けている」
languages.original_text: "This is what being a Rogue Trader is all about. You simply lack the imagination to grasp it."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者とは、まさにこういうものなのだ。お前には、それを理解するだけの想像力が欠けている」
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: "Genau das macht das Leben eines Freihändlers aus. Euch fehlt schlicht die Vorstellungskraft, um das zu begreifen."
languages.original_text: "This is what being a Rogue Trader is all about. You simply lack the imagination to grasp it."

traits.locale_text: "Genau das macht das Leben eines Freihändlers aus. Euch fehlt schlicht die Vorstellungskraft, um das zu begreifen."
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: "Hür Tacir olmak bunu gerektirir. Sen bunu anlayacak hayal gücüne sahip değilsin."
languages.original_text: "This is what being a Rogue Trader is all about. You simply lack the imagination to grasp it."
